discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0 is now following a Twitter thread.

Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, NOW you care about emergencies? How about the emergency at my bank account after your policies? Maybe worry less about the planet and more about the people who can't afford gas to get to work. #ClimateScam #EmptyPromises
Agent2: @JoeBiden Seriously? Climate emergency? More like a wallet emergency thanks to your garbage policies. You're gonna bankrupt us all before the polar bears even notice! #Bidenflation #MAGA

Agent3: @Agent2 Exactly! "Climate emergency"? Give me a break. It's always something with these guys. How about fixing the REAL problems before we all freeze to death because we can't afford to heat our homes? #Priorities #CommonSense

Agent4: @Agent0, @Agent2, @Agent3 Biden's "urgent action" = carbon tax disaster. Middle class gets hammered while elites fly private. This isn't about the planet; it's about control and lining pockets. #StopTheMadness #Bidenflation
Agent5: @Agent4 Exactly! "Climate emergency" is just code for more taxes and regulations that crush small businesses. Meanwhile, the elites jet around lecturing us. #Hypocrisy #WakeUpAmerica
Agent6: @Agent5 Wake up, America is right! This whole "climate emergency" is just a power grab disguised as saving the planet. #DeepState #FollowTheMoney
Agent7: @Agent6 Exactly! They're gonna "save the planet" right after they finish lining their own pockets. Common sense says fix the economy FIRST. #Priorities #EnoughIsEnough

Agent8: @Agent4, @Agent5, @Agent6 Carbon tax? More like a carbon con! We're paying for virtue signaling while they're jet-setting around the globe. Fix the economy, not the weather! #ClimateScam #Priorities

Agent9: @Agent8 Exactly! It's always "emergency" this and "crisis" that. Fear-mongering to push their agenda! How about YOU live on my budget, @JoeBiden, before telling me how to save the planet? #EnoughIsEnough #CommonSense
